entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Burns Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burns Lake Airport 7:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -24.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -28.3°C
Wind: NW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Snow beginning in the evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023
